title: Japan: traditions & trends in the 80's - Yrs 9-12
brief_description: A generally informative program that gives an overview to Japan in four main areas: 1. Rituals and religion. 2.Economy. 3. Technology. 4. Policy for the People. Each segment could be viewed separately.
